name: Space (itch) (expired bun)
description:
A game created at APU by Zackary Felix and Rebecca Zheng.

Tool: Unity | Mechanic: One-Button | Theme: Lonely


Zack F (https://zfelix.itch.io/space) : Coding, level design, play-testing
Rebecca Z: Art, sound, bug-testing

Music by SergeQuadrado and Katzen Tupas.
